mapper.select: SELECT rm_hotel_id as"hotelId",room_id as"roomId",room_type as"roomType",room_describe as"description", room_img as"img",room_status as"status",rm_breakfast_type as"breakfast",room_price as"price" FROM ht_manager JOIN ht_room on mg_hotel_id = rm_hotel_id WHERE manager_id=#{managerId}
mapper.update: update ht_room set order_ifshow=0 where room_id=#{roomId}
